summary: Changes the weight of dwemer clutter in skyrim to something I find more balanced
descriptionHtml:
Changes the weight of dwemer clutter in skyrim to something I find more balanced.
It always annoyed me that example a cog weigh ten and a gold ingot one so I made this.
This modifies most dwemer items, not equipment.
Put this as far back in your load order as possible, this mod should be compatible with everything.

ITEM before/after

Dwemer Bowl 2/1
Dwemer Bowl 2/1
Dwemer Pan 3/1.5
Dwemer Cog 10/5
Fork 0.5/0.25
Spoon 0.5/0.25
Knife 0.5/0.25
Large Dwemer Plate 2/4
Dwemer Lever 2/1
Small Dwemer Lever 2/0.75
Large Dwemer Strut 20/10
Solid Dwemer Metal 25/15
Large Decorative Dwemer Strut 15/10
Centurion Dynamo Core 4/2.5
author: Baconminecraft aka Ventusfreak
